patch.description: Update the role of a user. You cannot update your own role.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID to update role for

200.description: User role successfully updated

401.description: User not authenticated or trying to update own role

500.description: Internal server error occurred while updating user role

patch.description: Update the name of a user. Users can only update their own name.

200.description: User name successfully updated

401.description: User not authenticated or not authorized to update this user

500.description: Internal server error occurred while updating user name

patch.description: Update the password of the current authenticated user. Requires current password for verification.

400.description: Invalid password values or passwords do not match

401.description: User not authenticated or current password is incorrect

500.description: Internal server error occurred while updating password

post.description: Confirm a user's email address using a JWT token received via email

400.description: Invalid token or token has expired

500.description: Internal server error occurred while confirming email

post.description: Resend a confirmation email to the specified email address. Silently succeeds even if email is already verified or user does not exist for security reasons.

requestBody.description: Email address to resend confirmation to

500.description: Internal server error occurred while sending email

delete.description: Delete a user by their ID. Only users within the same organization can be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID to delete

500.description: Internal server error occurred while deleting user

post.description: Send a password reset email to the provided email address. If the email exists in the system, a reset link will be sent.

requestBody.description: Email address to send reset link to

204.description: Password reset email sent successfully. This response is returned regardless of whether the email exists to prevent email enumeration.

400.description: Invalid request format or validation errors

500.description: Internal server error while processing the request

post.description: Reset user password using the token received via email. The token must be valid and not expired.

requestBody.description: Password reset information including token and new password

400.description: Invalid request format, validation errors, or password requirements not met

500.description: Internal server error while processing the request

get.description: Returns configuration settings for the usage dashboard, including deployment mode and cost display settings. This endpoint helps the frontend determine which features to show based on the deployment type.

200.description: Usage configuration retrieved successfully. Returns deployment mode information and cost display settings.

get.summary: Get usage dashboard configuration

get.description: Returns aggregated usage statistics including total tokens, requests, active users, and cost information (self-hosted only). Dates are optional - if not provided, shows all usage.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date in ISO format. If provided, must be used with endDate.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date in ISO format. If provided, must be used with startDate.

200.description: Usage statistics retrieved successfully. Cost fields are only included in self-hosted deployments.

get.summary: Get overall usage statistics

get.description: Returns usage statistics grouped by model provider (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.) with optional time series data for trend analysis. Useful for provider comparison charts. Dates are optional - if not provided, shows all usage.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date in ISO format

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date in ISO format

parameters.name: includeTimeSeries
parameters.description: Whether to include time series data for trend charts. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Filter by provider (e.g., openai, anthropic)

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Filter by model ID

200.description: Provider usage statistics retrieved successfully. Includes percentage distribution and optional time series data.

get.summary: Get usage statistics by provider

get.description: Returns rows aligned by date with tokens per provider. Shape: { timeSeries: [{ date, values: { [provider]: tokens } }] }

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Filter by provider (e.g., openai, anthropic)

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Filter by model ID

200.description: Chart-ready provider time series

get.summary: Get provider usage time series aligned by date (chart-ready)

get.description: Returns usage statistics grouped by individual models with percentage distribution. Dates are optional - if not provided, shows all usage.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date in ISO format

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date in ISO format

parameters.name: maxModels
parameters.description: Maximum number of models to return. Defaults to 10. Frontend can decide how to handle aggregation if needed.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Filter by model ID

200.description: Model usage distribution retrieved successfully.

get.summary: Get usage distribution by model

get.description: Returns paginated user usage statistics with search, sorting, and filtering capabilities. Includes activity status and optional model breakdown per user. Dates are optional - if not provided, shows all usage.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date in ISO format

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date in ISO format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of users per page (1-1000). Defaults to 50.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of users to skip for pagination. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter users by name or email

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort users by. Defaults to tokens.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order (ascending or descending). Defaults to desc.

parameters.name: includeModelBreakdown
parameters.description: Whether to include detailed model usage breakdown for each user. Defaults to true.

200.description: User usage statistics retrieved successfully. Includes pagination metadata and optional model breakdown.

get.summary: Get usage statistics by user

parameters.name: objectName
parameters.description: Name of the object to retrieve

parameters.name: objectName
parameters.description: Name of the object to delete

parameters.name: objectName
parameters.description: Name of the object to get URL for

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password. Sets authentication cookies on successful login.

200.description: Login successful. Authentication cookies are set.

post.description: Register a new user account with email, password, and organization name. Automatically logs in the user and sets authentication cookies.

201.description: Registration successful. User is automatically logged in and authentication cookies are set.

400.description: Invalid request format or validation errors

409.description: User with this email already exists

post.description: Refresh expired access tokens using the refresh token stored in cookies. Returns new authentication cookies.

200.description: Token refresh successful. New authentication cookies are set.

get.description: Get the current authenticated user's email and role. If access token is expired but refresh token is valid, automatically refreshes tokens and sets new cookies.

200.description: User information retrieved successfully. If tokens were refreshed, new cookies are set.

401.description: Not authenticated - no valid tokens found

get.summary: Get current user information

post.description: Log out the current user by clearing authentication cookies.

200.description: Logout successful. Authentication cookies are cleared.

name.description: The name for this integration instance

serverUrl.description: The URL of the custom MCP server

authMethod.description: Authentication method for the MCP server

authHeaderName.description: Custom auth header name (e.g., X-API-Key). Required for CUSTOM_HEADER auth method. Ignored for BEARER_TOKEN (always uses Authorization header).

slug.description: Unique slug identifier for the predefined integration

description.description: Description of what this integration provides

authHeaderName.description: HTTP header name for authentication (if applicable)

credentialFields.description: Credential fields required for this integration

name.description: The new name for the integration

credentials.description: Authentication credentials (will be encrypted). Provide to rotate the stored secret/token.

authHeaderName.description: Custom auth header name. Only used in combination with CUSTOM_HEADER integrations.

capabilities.description: Discovered capabilities from the MCP server

streaming.description: Indicates if the session is streaming

input.description: The input to use for the inference

streaming.description: Enable streaming mode for real-time response updates

totalCost.description: Total cost incurred in the period. Only available in self-hosted deployments.

currency.description: Currency code for cost information. Only available in self-hosted deployments.

activeUsers.description: Number of users who made requests within the active user threshold (last 30 days)

totalUsers.description: Total number of unique users who made requests in the specified period

topModels.description: List of the most frequently used model names, ordered by usage

tokens.description: Number of tokens at this point

requests.description: Number of requests at this point
